title: Change the session timeout limit for OO Workflow Designer
content:
You can change the default session timeout (30 minutes) of the OO Workflow Designer server by configuring the tomcat web.xml file.

To change the timeout limit for OO Workflow Designer server:

  1. Open the <installation_folder>/designer/tomcat/conf/web.xml file with any XML editor.

  2. Search for the following property:

    <session-config> <session-timeout>30</session-timeout> </session-config>

  3. Change the <session-timeout> value in minutes as required and save the file.

  4. Restart the OO Workflow Designer server.
